assault_rifles.name: HK416
assault_rifles.description: An assault rifle designed by Heckler & Koch, favored by many special operations units for its reliability. It is the weapon reportedly used in the operation that resulted in the death of Osama bin Laden.

assault_rifles.name: M4A1
assault_rifles.description: An updated version of the M4 carbine, with fully automatic fire capability. Highly customizable with a variety of optics and accessories.

assault_rifles.name: MK 18 Mod 0 CQBR
assault_rifles.description: A Close Quarters Battle Rifle (CQBR) based on the M4A1, with a shorter barrel that makes it ideal for combat in confined spaces.

assault_rifles.name: FN SCAR-H (MK 17)
assault_rifles.description: A Belgian-made battle rifle that offers greater stopping power than 5.56mm weapons. It is known for its reliability and modularity.

assault_rifles.name: FN SCAR-L (MK 16)
assault_rifles.description: The lighter variant of the SCAR, used in various combat situations. Although largely replaced by the HK416, it remains in limited use.

pistols.name: SIG Sauer P226 MK25
pistols.description: The official sidearm of the Navy SEALs for many years. It is known for its durability and reliability, especially in maritime environments.

pistols.name: Glock 19
pistols.description: A popular pistol among special forces for its reliability, light weight, and high ammunition capacity. It has been more recently adopted by the SEALs.

pistols.name: Heckler & Koch HK45C
pistols.description: A compact .45 caliber pistol that offers great stopping power in a manageable size.

sniper_rifles.name: MK 13 Mod 5
sniper_rifles.description: A bolt-action sniper rifle based on the Remington 700 action. It is the primary sniper rifle of the Navy SEALs.

sniper_rifles.name: McMillan TAC-50 (MK 15)
sniper_rifles.description: A long-range anti-materiel sniper rifle. It is used to engage targets at extreme distances and lightly armored vehicles.

sniper_rifles.name: Barrett M82/M107
sniper_rifles.description: A semi-automatic anti-materiel sniper rifle, used for neutralizing long-range targets and for explosive ordnance disposal.

sniper_rifles.name: Knight's Armament Company SR-25 (MK 11)
sniper_rifles.description: A semi-automatic sniper rifle that allows for rapid follow-up shots.

machine_guns.name: M249 SAW
machine_guns.description: A light machine gun that provides significant suppressive fire at the squad level.

machine_guns.name: MK 48 Mod 0/1
machine_guns.description: A more powerful light machine gun than the M249, based on the FN Minimi design.

machine_guns.name: M60E4 (MK 43 Mod 1)
machine_guns.description: An improved version of the M60 machine gun, lighter and more reliable than its predecessors.

shotguns.name: Benelli M4 (M1014)
shotguns.description: A semi-automatic shotgun used for breaching and close-quarters combat.

shotguns.name: Mossberg 590A1
shotguns.description: A robust and reliable pump-action shotgun, popular with law enforcement and military forces.

submachine_guns.name: Heckler & Koch MP7
submachine_guns.description: A compact personal defense weapon that offers greater armor-piercing capability than traditional pistols.
